page.title: 15Housing in Breedon
page.content: There are various types of housing in Breedon and Tonge. There are bungalows, cottages, flats, semi_ detached and detached houses. Bungalows are only one storey high and cottages are old fashioned houses which have thatched roofs made from straw. The main houses in Breedon is Breedon Hall which is a large house that has been converted into one roomed flats for old age pensioners. The detached houses in the area are made from brick with a tiled roof. Some houses have double glazed windows which are windows with a double thickness of glass to prevent heat loss. The most common housing is semi_detached houses which are two houses joined together. The most common building materials are bricks.
